events.text: I left out some details from Henry's story. Didn't mention the other visitor to Olivia and Jesse. Didn't mention the episode was on his laptop, and the recording might have something Henry missed. I felt bad about keeping it a secret. They'd ask him themselves, and figure it out sooner or later.
But I was keeping my cards close to the vest, with one card in particular that I never planned to play, a bloodstained ace that would never see the rest of the deck again.
It was me. I killed Thoroughbred. And I was here to make sure nobody found out.
